channel.title: Idea's for Devil Island II
channel.description:
[i][color=black]Hi i need idea's for my second server but u guys dont post on my other thread so i tought lets make this 1 :D
Use this form for a idea [/i]
[code] Name of u : Idea : [/code]
[i] Accepted Idea's
- 377 webclient ( planplan ) - Rares are rare ( planplan ) - - - -
Decilined Idea's
- - - - - - -
Best Idea So Far
Name : Planplan Idea name : 377 Webclient
Please give me some idea's so i can work on it :D [/i]

item.title: Idea's for Devil Island II
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

[quote=“ricky james, post:13, topic:122061”][quote author=Called enzo link=topic=171662.msg1589483#msg1589483 date=1184249858]
ricky… u ever seen priv servers wit member-free I DID so it is possible.
[/quote]No not really i say it’s kinda stuiped no point in it,i never said it was inpossible[/quote]

I dont think its stupid… i think its good i know people come here for those stuff

But im trying to make it like rs , not very the same like xp will be faster… and they dont pay rs cash for it… =)

yes!
